txt.en:
'With your help [placeholder], I believe the Quick Post service will once again be the respected establishment it used to be!

'We must act quickly! There's a mail satchel on the table there that must go to Postman Spinner in Woodhall as soon as possible, and you're just the one to do it!

'Woodhall is quite the walk from Frogmorton -- there isn't a direct route, so you might need to head out to Budgeford or Stock to find the road there. Good luck, and watch out for nosey hobbits! And steer clear of water, for it won't do to hand Postman Spinner a soaked pile of mail!'
'The satchel for Woodhall is over there on the table. Take it to Postman Spinner as quickly as possible, and let no nosey hobbits interfere in your duty!'
Postman Oddfoot of Frogmorton has asked you to deliver a mail satchel to Woodhall.
You have failed to deliver the satchel
You were spotted by a nosey hobbit
Collect the satchel from Postman Oddfoot's table

Postman Spinner can be found in the centre of Woodhall.\n\nDeliver the satchel to Postman Spinner in Woodhall as quickly as possible. Let no nosey hobbits interfere with your duty, and do not let the satchel get wet!
Carry satchel to Postman Spinner in Woodhall
